hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the awe-inspiring beauty of VOMO Island Fiji - a five-star oasis set on its own private island in the pristine Mamanuca archipelago, offering the perfect setting for outdoor adventures or moments of repose. Unique access to two islands - VOMO and Vomo Lailai - embrace exclusive privacy and variety, at a resort masterfully balancing family-friendly experiences with adults-only luxury. Spend your days adventuring out on mountain treks, windsurfing and scuba diving, then find bliss at the tranquil Kui Spa or simply relax poolside with a cocktail. The adults-only Rocks Bar offers a dedicated space to unwind with sunset views and expertly crafted drinks, while award-winning kids’ programs keep younger guests entertained. Sit back and relax, knowing the freshest local produce awaits at the resort’s fine dining restaurants. Savour international flavours at Reef Restaurant, or try Asian-inspired delights at the adults-only Rock Restaurant. Whatever kind of escape you seek, this slice of tropical paradise is sure to refresh you, body and soul.
